name: Math-a-Magician
overview: Math-a-Magician is an educational game teaching arithmetics. The game is played by simply answering the math problems that are asked by the program. By answering correctly a wizard appears and awards the player with a score. The game covers all of the four operators (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division) and both whole numbers and fractions. There are four different difficulty levels to choose from (from beginner to expert) and the number of questions to be asked can also be set. Questions are timed by default but this can be turned off. When all questions have been asked the player is given a score.
